exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (f : MapFlag A), exists x : Map A, f = flag_true A x \/ f = flag_false A x

Premises:
flag_false : forall A : Set, Map A -> MapFlag A
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Inductive MapFlag (A : Set) : Set := flag_true : Map A -> MapFlag A | flag_false : Map A -> MapFlag A For MapFlag: Argument scope is [type_scope] For flag_true: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For flag_false: Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
flag_true : forall A : Set, Map A -> MapFlag A
map_sum : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), m = M0 A \/ (exists (a : ad) (x : A), m = M1 A a x) \/ (exists x y : Map A, m = M2 A x y)
prechain_sum : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)
dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (single A x)) -> (forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> P (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, dist_chain A p -> P p
Inductive dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := dist_single : forall x : Map A, dist_chain A (single A x) | dist_concat_s : forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y) | dist_concat_m : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For dist_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
MapFlag_rect : forall (A : Set) (P : MapFlag A -> Type), (forall m : Map A, P (flag_true A m)) -> (forall m : Map A, P (flag_false A m)) -> forall m : MapFlag A, P m
MapFlag_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : MapFlag A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (flag_true A m)) -> (forall m : Map A, P (flag_false A m)) -> forall m : MapFlag A, P m
MapFlag_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : MapFlag A -> Set), (forall m : Map A, P (flag_true A m)) -> (forall m : Map A, P (flag_false A m)) -> forall m : MapFlag A, P m
MapCollect_as_Fold : forall (A B : Type) (f : ad -> A -> Map B) (m : Map A), MapCollect A B f m = MapFold A (Map B) (M0 B) (MapMerge B) f m
prechain_dom_ok_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> P T (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> P T p -> P T (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), prechain_dom_ok A m p -> P m p
MapSweep_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> f a y = true
chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> P T r (single A x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> P T r (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (m0 : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A m m0 p -> P m m0 p
non_dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (concat A (single A x) x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), P (concat A (concat A z x) x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, non_dist_chain A p -> P p
MapSweep_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad), MapSweep1 A f pf m = None -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f (pf a) y = false
MapFold_orb : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A), MapFold A bool false orb f m = match MapSweep A f m with | Some _ => true | None => false end
Inductive prechain_dom_ok (A : Set) : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop := domok_single : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T (single A x) | domok_concat : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> prechain_dom_ok A T (concat A p x) For prechain_dom_ok: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For domok_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For domok_concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
Inductive chain (A : Set) : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop := chain_single : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x) | chain_concat_s : forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A (single A x) y) | chain_concat_m : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y ->...-> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y) For chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For chain_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]
MapSweep_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> MapGet A m a = Some y
N.eqb_refl : forall x : N, (x =? x)%N = true
MapFold_canon : forall (A B : Type) (m0 : Map B), mapcanon B m0 -> forall op : Map B -> Map B -> Map B, (forall m1 : Map B, mapcanon B m1 -> forall m2 : Map B, mapcanon B m2 -> mapcanon B (op m1 m2)) -> forall f : ad -> A -> Map B, (forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon B (f a y)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon B (MapFold A (Map B) m0 op f m)
MapFold1_as_Fold : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M) (f : ad -> A -> M) (pf : ad -> ad) (m : Map A), MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m = MapFold A M neutral op (fun (a : ad) (y : A) => f (pf a) y) m
prechain_incr_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), P r (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> P r p -> P r (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), prechain_incr A m p -> P m p
Inductive non_dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := non_dist_concat_s : forall x : Map A, non_dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) x) | non_dist_concat_m_hd : forall (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) x) | non_dist_concat_m_tl : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For non_dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For non_dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For non_dist_concat_m_hd: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For non_dist_concat_m_tl: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _]
prechain_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Set), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_rect : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Type), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
MapFold1_as_Fold_1 : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M) (m : Map A) (f f' : ad -> A -> M) (pf pf' : ad -> ad), (forall (a : ad) (y : A), f (pf a) y = f' (pf' a) y) -> MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m = MapFold1 A M neutral op f' pf' m
Inductive prechain_incr (A : Set) : mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop := incr_single : forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), prechain_incr A r (single A x) | incr_concat : forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x) For prechain_incr: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For incr_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For incr_concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
MapFold_canon_1 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 : Map B), mapcanon B m0 -> forall op : Map B -> Map B -> Map B, (forall m1 : Map B, mapcanon B m1 -> forall m2 : Map B, mapcanon B m2 -> mapcanon B (op m1 m2)) -> forall f : ad -> A -> Map B, (forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon B (f a y)) -> forall (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad), mapcanon B (MapFold1 A (Map B) m0 op f pf m)
MapFold_ext : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M), (forall a : M, op neutral a = a) -> (forall a : M, op a neutral = a) -> (forall a b c : M, op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) -> forall (f : ad -> A -> M) (m m' : Map A), eqmap A m m' -> MapFold A M neutral op f m = MapFold A M neutral op f m'
MapFold1_ext : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M), (forall a : M, op neutral a = a) -> (forall a : M, op a neutral = a) -> (forall a b c : M, op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) -> forall (f : ad -> A -> M) (m m' : Map A), eqmap A m m' -> forall pf : ad -> ad, MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m = MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m'
BinNatDef.N.succ_double = fun x : N => match x with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end : N -> N Argument scope is [N_scope]
MapFold_Merge_disjoint_1 : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M), (forall a : M, op neutral a = a) -> (forall a : M, op a neutral = a) -> (forall a b c : M, op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) -> (forall a b : M, op a b = op b a) -> forall (f : ad -> A -> M) (m1 m2 : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad), MapDisjoint A A m1 m2 -> MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf (MapMerge A m1 m2) = op (MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m1) (MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m2)
MapFold_Put_behind_disjoint_2 : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M), (forall a : M, op neutral a = a) -> (forall a : M, op a neutral = a) -> (forall a b c : M, op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) -> (forall a b : M, op a b = op b a) -> forall (f : ad -> A -> M) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A) (pf : ad -> ad), MapGet A m a = None -> MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf (MapPut_behind A m a y) = op (f (pf a) y) (MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m)
MapFold_Put_disjoint_2 : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M), (forall a : M, op neutral a = a) -> (forall a : M, op a neutral = a) -> (forall a b c : M, op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) -> (forall a b : M, op a b = op b a) -> forall (f : ad -> A -> M) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A) (pf : ad -> ad), MapGet A m a = None -> MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf (MapPut A m a y) = op (f (pf a) y) (MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m)
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
MapFold_as_fold : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M), (forall a b c : M, op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) -> (forall a : M, op neutral a = a) -> (forall a : M, op a neutral = a) -> forall (f : ad -> A -> M) (m : Map A), MapFold A M neutral op f m = List.fold_right (fun (r : ad * A) (m0 : M) => let (a, y) := r in op (f a y) m0) neutral (alist_of_Map A m)

``` 
intros A f.
exists (match f with
          | flag_true _ x => x
          | flag_false _ x => x
        end).
destruct f; [left | right]; reflexivity.
```

original: intros A f. exists (match f with | flag_true _ x => x | flag_false _ x => x end). destruct f; [left | right]; reflexivity.
